description:
The Code of the Federated States of Micronesia (FSM) was amended to include the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ), to increase the size of its Territorial Sea and to be inclusive of the current political status of FSM and other purpose as it deem fit (16 December 1988)

The amended section 103 of the Act states: 
"The sovereignty of the Federated States of Micronesia extends to its internal waters and Territorial Sea,
including sovereign rights over the living and non-living resources in the Territorial Sea and internal waters and
in the airspace above the Territorial Sea and internal waters as well as its bed and subsoil".

https://www.un.org/Depts/los/LEGISLATIONANDTREATIES/PDFFILES/FSM_1988_Act.pdf
name: Federated States of Micronesia Territorial Sea Zone (12 Nautical Miles)
